description: Comprehensive Playwright E2E tests for SleepSync app covering auth, dashboard, challenges, and friends features

userStories.title: Create test utilities and auth helpers
userStories.description: As a developer, I need reusable test utilities for authentication so tests can run with mocked or real auth state.
acceptanceCriteria: Create tests/e2e/helpers/auth.js with functions to mock authenticated state via localStorage/Supabase session injection
Create tests/e2e/helpers/fixtures.js with test data (mock user, mock sleep data, mock friends)
Add a test user setup that bypasses real Supabase auth for testing
Playwright tests pass: npx playwright test tests/e2e/helpers

userStories.title: Auth flow e2e tests
userStories.description: As a developer, I need e2e tests that verify the authentication UI flows work correctly.
acceptanceCriteria: Test: Auth section is visible on unauthenticated visit
Test: Can switch between Magic Link and Password tabs
Test: Magic link form validates email input
Test: Password form shows both email and password fields
Test: Error messages display for invalid inputs
Test: Authenticated users see dashboard instead of auth section
All tests in tests/e2e/auth-flow.spec.js pass

userStories.title: Dashboard e2e tests
userStories.description: As a developer, I need e2e tests that verify the dashboard displays sleep data and comparisons correctly.
acceptanceCriteria: Test: Dashboard shows sleep score, heart rate, and sleep duration metrics
Test: Comparison section shows baseline vs current period
Test: Change indicators show correct direction (up/down arrows) and colors
Test: Dashboard handles empty data state gracefully
Test: Navigation between dashboard tabs works
All tests in tests/e2e/dashboard-flow.spec.js pass

userStories.title: Challenges e2e tests
userStories.description: As a developer, I need e2e tests that verify challenge creation and management flows.
acceptanceCriteria: Test: Create challenge modal opens and has required fields (name, duration, metric)
Test: Challenge form validation works (required fields, valid dates)
Test: Challenges list displays active and completed challenges
Test: Challenge detail view shows participants and progress
Test: Invite friends modal opens from challenge detail
Test: Pending invitations badge shows correct count
All tests in tests/e2e/challenges-flow.spec.js pass

userStories.title: Friends e2e tests
userStories.description: As a developer, I need e2e tests that verify friend management flows.
acceptanceCriteria: Test: Friends tab shows friends list or empty state
Test: Search by email input works and shows results
Test: Send friend request button is clickable
Test: Pending requests section shows incoming requests
Test: Accept/decline buttons work on pending requests
Test: Friends badge shows pending request count
All tests in tests/e2e/friends-flow.spec.js pass
